short_desc: Handles Documentary Transfer Tax and City Real Property Conveyance Tax for Alameda County
description: Documentary Transfer Tax (R & T code 11902-11934): An ordinance adopted to impose, on each deed, instrument, or writing by which any lands, tenements, or other realty sold within the county shall be granted, assigned, transferred, or otherwise conveyed to, or vested in. The purchaser or purchasers, or any other person or persons, by his or their direction, when consideration or value of the interest or property conveyed exceeds one hundred dollars a tax at the rate of fifty-five cents for each five hundred dollars or fractional part there of.City Real Property Conveyance Tax: Several cities impose own city real property transfer tax at full value.
